CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 27, 1959, page A3 reads: "Counting New Members - NAACP officials tabulate some of the more than 600 memberships turned in by workers at th final report meeting of the 1959 drive. Left to right seated: Virginia Valentine and William Fredericks, co-chairman of the Tri-Borough area; Matthew Moore, co-chairman of the campaign, and Dorothea B. Merchant, campaign director. Standing: Theodore Jones, champion membership solicitor for several years, and Gaines Bradford, campaign co-chairman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Theodore Jones and Gaines Bradford standing behind Virginia Valentine, William Fredericks, Matthew Moore, and Dorothea B. Merchant leaning forward, tallying memberships from the 1959 NAACP membership drive, in gymnasium of Centre Avenue YMCA
